entry.def: If something has a bearing on a situation or event, it is relevant to it.

example.ex: Experts generally agree that diet has an important bearing on your general health...
example.tran: 专家们普遍认为饮食和健康总体状况密切相关。

example.ex: My father's achievements really don't have any bearing on what I do.
example.tran: 我父亲的成就与我做的事情真的毫无关联。

entry.def: Someone's bearing is the way in which they move or stand.

example.ex: She later wrote warmly of his bearing and behaviour.
example.tran: 后来她以饱含热情的笔触写到了他的举止和行为。

entry.def: If you take a bearing with a compass, you use it to work out the direction in which a particular place lies or in which something is moving.

entry.tran: 清楚/不清楚所在方位；知道/不知道下一步怎么做
entry.def: If you get your bearings or find your bearings, you find out where you are or what you should do next. If you lose your bearings, you do not know where you are or what you should do next.

example.ex: A sightseeing tour of the city is included to help you get your bearings...
example.tran: 市区观光游也包含在内，帮助你熟悉一下这里的情况。

example.ex: How badly the administration had lost its bearings was underlined by what happened yesterday.
example.tran: 管理之差从昨天发生的事情就可见一斑了。

entry.def: Bearings are small metal balls that are placed between moving parts of a machine in order to make them move smoothly and easily over each other.

example.ex: An oil seal was replaced, along with both front wheel bearings.
example.tran: 换了一个油封和两个前轮轴承。

sentences.sentence: "those issues have no bearing on our situation"

means.word_mean: 2. the direction or path along which something moves or along which it lies
4. characteristic way of bearing one's body;
5. heraldry consisting of a design or image depicted on a shield
6. a rotating support placed between moving parts to allow them to move easily
1. (of a structural member) withstanding a weight or strain

Sentence.sentence: Psychologists are finding that hope plays a surprisingly vital role in giving people a measurable advantage in rounds as diverse as academic achievement, bearing up in tough jobs, and coping with tragic illness.

sentences.en: He is a man of erect and soldierly bearing.
sentences.cn: 他是一个身子挺直、具有军人风度的男子。

jushi.english: With the aid of a compass the traveler can find his bearings.
jushi.chinese: 旅行者可以借助罗盘来判定自己所处的方位。

jushi.english: Her kindly bearing caused all of us to like her.
jushi.chinese: 她和蔼的举止使得我们所有的人都喜欢她。

jushi.english: He is a man of erect and soldierly bearing.
